name: jaguar-metro
description: Dependent-Jaguar, MetroRail: Data Modeling & Database Design (LG Goal 126)

scripts.//: run repl: open a REPL session with all your library code loaded
run db:create: create the database for the current NODE_ENV
run db:migrate: run all schema migrations for the database
run db:seed: insert seed (sample) data into the database
run db:drop: delete the database for the current NODE_ENV
run db:reset: drop, create, and migrate the database
run db:console: open a console session for running queries against the databas

author: Maurice Caviness <Compsight@aol.com>
Max
